text: Thank you <@UJQNNKKHN>, <@U26BLKGE4> and <@U7SL518D6> for a pretty darn good podcast recording on local web dev and tolerating me talking about the weather :wink:
Always happy to drop in and chat <@UD53A9UUR>! Also, /giphy weatherman might be my new favorite giphy rabbit hole.
